name.ch: 獨立研究 ：人類運動學習

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: "Human beings are capable of acquiring complex motor sequences via repetitive learning. In this course, the students will learn the cognitive processes and brain mechanisms underlying human motor learning via reading and discussing journal papers and carrying out experiments."
goal.ch: 經由學習，人類能習得相當複雜的動作序列。本課程將藉由文獻討論及實驗操作，讓修課同學掌握運動學習的認知歷程，以及其背後的腦生理機制。

content.en: "Through weekly meetings and discussions, the students are expected to establish theoretical backgrounds and experimental skills on the study of human motor learning. The students will be able to access various instruments of grip force measurement, motion capture, psychophysical experimentation and will acquire basic skills in Matlab programming to coordinate these equipments and apply to their study of human action."

textbook.en: 由教師每週指定與課程主題相關之期刊論文
textbook.ch: Weekly papers assigned by the lecturer

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.ch:
課程參與（討論、發問及教材閱讀）：45%
期末報告：45%
出席：10%

en.competency: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

ch.competency: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫

ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗
